DOC.brief_summary: Fast track programs, multimodal therapy strategies, have been introduced in many surgical fields to minimize postoperative morbidity and mortality. This study is intended to evaluate a rehabilitation program in comparison with a historical series.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Rehabilitation Program After Lung Surgery
DOC.criteria: adult patient ASA 1, 2 or 3 lung surgery (posterolateral or axillary approach) epidural analgesia preoperative oxygen therapy lack of autonomy unstable coronary artery disease FEV1 < 50% pregnancy
